title: How to Communicate using Body Language
headline: Learn the best-kept body language secrets to be successful and win over any audience with this free online course.
description: We live in a world of communication where surprisingly only 7% is verbal while 93% is nonverbal due to our body language and cues. However, it’s not what we communicate but how well we convey our message that differentiates between success and failure. In this course, you will discover the best secrets and techniques of body language and we’ll show you how to interpret gestures, develop your communication skills and be a winner.
courseDescription:
Do you always lose arguments or cannot ace that interview you thought was yours? Are you unable to impress a client and clinch a deal? Perhaps it's not what you are saying but how well you communicate or present yourself that makes the difference between your success and losing out. Unfortunately, you do not realise it but irrespective of how well prepared you are, your body language, gestures and mannerisms unknowingly give you away and can create a negative image. This course is a solution to your problems. It will help you understand body language with all its gestures, expressions and movements and enable you to communicate effectively.

We begin by exploring the basics of non-verbal communication, using pictures and video footage of people in real-life scenarios. Learn to read and interpret others' thoughts by their gestures and use them to your benefit. Then we teach you to improve your body language, instructing you on the best tricks and techniques to help you detect different personality types and related communication styles. Become familiar with all the gestures, signals and manipulation techniques to display or use at interviews and workplaces to negotiate or control situations successfully.

Regardless of your profession, position or career, this course will help you read people's nonverbal gestures and make you more aware of your non-verbal cues and signals to improve your body language. Joining this course will help you change how you interact with others and bring more confidence, success and positivity to your life. Raise your interpersonal skills and project the right message and attitude by joining this course today and be ready to race ahead in your job and life ambitions.
